The PM said: This is all about the past. It has gone on and on and I can understand why he feels the pressure of that.`` I choose to judge him by the work he has done for me for the government and for the country. He has run the Downing Street press office in a very straightforward, professional and competent way . David Cameron said he compared Andy Coulson 's regime favourably to`` the days of dodgy dossiers, Alastair Campbell , Damian McBride , and all that nonsense we had from the past government''.
